Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: sau
Reviews.Content: I was debating whether to get this TV for such a low price of $548.  I tried to see if there are more reviews other than the existing 7 reviews in Amazon.  I called on Dec. 16 (Sunday) afternoon at 4pm to see if Haier has any customer service representative working, and to my surprise there was a person answering the phone.  I asked if there is any authorized Haier service center in San Francisco and the answer was yes.  Therefore, I decided to give this TV a try and order it from Amazon.  I received the TV today with enhanced home delivery (EHD).  EHD means the delivery person will deliver the item inside your home and take the TV out for visual inspection and turning it on to ensure the unit is working properly before leaving.  I immediately checked the TV by connecting it to a DVD player to ensure the HDMI ports worked.  I also scanned the TV channels to ensure the tuner work.  The TV work beautifully: the color is brilliant and the sound is good.  I own two other TVs:  a 40" Sony LCD and a 42" Panasonic LED.  So far, I am glad that I make this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price, plan for surround sound system
Reviews.Author: Plantain
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV yesterday and for the price I think it gives you alot of bang for your buck. Its quite large with a great refresh rate. The sound however is terrible and you will definately need to get either a soundbar or surround sound system to compliment this system. I can usually live without one but this is the exception.

Reviews.Title: Good Value, Decent Picture, Very Terrible Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: Brian Berndt
Reviews.Content: This 55 inch TV was a great value for the price that I paid (under 700 +tax, shipped).  I am happy with the Picture (1080p, 120 refresh rate, LED).  My son has found that the tv picture quality degrades when very fast motion appears on the set.  This causes some blurring...which was specifically mentioned as not being a problem for this TV.This TV has 3 HDMI inputs which is adequate.  There is not a digital sound output as available from other brands.The biggest knock on this TV is the terrible sound quality from the internal speakers.  I am able to use my digital audio output from my Directv box directly to my surround sound system, as well as our PS3 that we use for BluRay movies (and gaming), but there are times that I would not normally run the surround sound with my previous rear projection TV, and now I have to use the surround sound for everything.

Reviews.Title: Very fast shipping and good graph quality!
Reviews.Author: congshu wang
Reviews.Content: Super fast shipping with good quality.  It is not heavy so it is easy to carry.  Very slim and looks very cool.  I checked the quality with some HD videos and both sounds and graph are excellent!  The size is just right for room!  You can use it as an extra laptop monitor or TV, very convenient.  The price is appropriate.  I think this TV will be the best choice at this price.

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped for
Reviews.Author: Maniac Thanatos
Reviews.Content: While Inwas slightly worried by some of the complaints for this tv. The lighting and sound. I found the tv has sufficient sound levels(I have yet to turn it above 40, which is loud and barely over half way up) and the lighting effect is only truly noticeable if you actually looking for it. My though is that those people who felt these were major issues most likely had defective models. Which can happen with any electronic device. Over all the picture and audio qualities are great and I will be happy to use this tv for years to come.

Reviews.Title: GREAT deal for the price a great TV. Need a sound bar/surround sound though!
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: I paid under $570 for this tv on sale. Received it quickly, and it was easy to set up. The picture is amazing. The remote has new batteries in it, and it doesn't have a very far range. You have to be closer than 8 feet to the tv for the remote to work. Not a great feature if you have a big space. Don't know if it is just me or not. But you can program your DISH remote to work the TV, so not a big deal. The only downfall on the TV is the sound as others have said. I wasn't sure what people meant about it having horrible sound. But, I bought it since it was such a good deal. As soon as I took it out of the box I noticed that the speaker is only a circle about the size of a dessert plate on the back of the tv. The tv does get very loud. So it isn't that it is too quiet, it's just the quality of the sound. It is muffled and sounds like to are listening to an old radio or something. BUT...it's an easy fix. I bought a sound bar also on sale for $36 shipped. It was normally $110, and bought it on Amazon cheaper than Walmart had it. I attatched the sound bar bracket to the wall mount and then plugged the sound bar into the tv. Amazing. So, even though I had to spend an extra $36 for the tv to be perfect, I have no problem with it...it was still an awesome price for an awesome TV. I am not picky about having high def sound or surround sound...but I would definately reccomend if you buy this tv, to just buy the sound bar with it so you have it right away and don't have to wait for it and listen to the bad sound for a few days before getting it. You will kick yourself if you don't. I did. :)

Reviews.Title: Returning, but might be ok for you
Reviews.Author: DHXlive "Danny Hauger"
Reviews.Content: I needed a digital optical output, says it has one, mine did not!Blurring of motion was an issue for some media, not for others. Set looks nice and durable. But the blur and the audio combo put me to return it and get something else.If you have certain needs and just want a big set, this was a great price when I bought it, but overall, not going to cut it for me.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied, much better than my Vizio
Reviews.Author: beishixu
Reviews.Content: The images are crystal clear and it is much better than my Vizio. I think this is the best buy I got from Amazon so far.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, poor sound, excellent value at the price
Reviews.Author: Li Ma
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good. The sound quality is poor, but I fixed the problem by connecting a pair of speakers. Overall excellent value at the price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Deanna5063
Reviews.Content: Very good tv.  great picture and sound.  The labeling on the remote took a little while for my son to learn though.  Switching between the DVR, CPU, Wii, DVD player with the oddly labelled buttons had my son calling me into his room for a few days until he got it down.  Otherwise, we love this tv and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tv at a wonderful price. Great depth, color, sound and every thing I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!!  D
Reviews.Author: quinnette
Reviews.Content: Definately need a sound bar or surround sound, but We got this TV for under 600.00!!  Had it alittle over a week & we love it so far!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Bhawk
Reviews.Content: I first came in contact with this brand in Shanghai China at the Hilton. I stayed there many times and saw no issues with ones I watched. The picture quality isn't as good as my 55" Sony, but the price tag was a quarter of the Sony. The sound quality isn't great, but I have always run my TV's through a sound system so not a big deal.Overall this gets 5 stars from me based on the value and quality of the picture. Delivery was super fast and set up could not be easier.

Reviews.Title: Great price for led TV.
Reviews.Author: Dave Heckel
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy,I use Bose sound system, sound is great.Connected to Dish sat.picture is perfect.Very happy with Amazon and Haier TV.

Reviews.Title: You can't beat what you get for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This is not a top end model TV, so don't try and compare it to one. That said, for the price you will get one heck of a bang, for your buck!!!! The picture quality on HD programming is awesome, some have complained of a blur, I have not noticed one at all. It's crisp and clean, it does have a sub par sound quality, more what you would expect from a 32" version. But at 55" you won't find a better deal! I can watch it just fine with the stock speakers it has, but will prolly end up getting a sound bar just to make this TV perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: Loverly - Update
Reviews.Author: FinalFleetwood
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED (versus LCD) flatscreen. It replaces a 15 inch set in the kitchen. Have only had it up and running for a couple of days, but am thus far impressed. The difference in resolution is palpable - especially because of the HDMI connection between the FiOS box and the set (no maze of RCA cables!). Am still tweaking some of the settings a little, as expected - but the price was good, the overall set is quite nice, the picture is stunning, and the whole setup process was sinfully easy. Let's hope the longevity is as good as everything else.UPDATE 12/25......I just came across the two comments indicating the mislabeling of my review, which is for the 24-inch Haier LE24C2380 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV, NOT the 55" version.  No clue why this mixup happened - I wasn't writing about a tv I hadn't bought.And indeed, he (author) could not fit a 55 inch tv in the kitchen!Sorry for the confusion - but in this case I'm innocent.Dan

Reviews.Title: Defective model
Reviews.Author: Blair A. Aquilia
Reviews.Content: I don't know if the particular television I received is just bad, or if it was just manufactured incorrectly. On a black screen the black levels are SO uneven you can actually see in the center of the screen a rounded black spot that is about a foot and a half in diameter, this is the only part of the screen that has "even" black levels. The edges are very uneven, and the corners are very bright, you can definitely tell there are ripples of light in circles starting at the center even dark spot, and making its way up to the corners. On a white screen you can see the center is obviously the darkest and it causes what your watching to appear brightest on the sides and have a center dark line like a quarter of the width of the panel going down the entire center. It's like the tv was laid sideways for a long period of time, or was just manufactured wrong because you can definitely tell the panel itself is pulled backwards causing the light to be very uneven across the panel from the led's on the edge. You can tell the panel is actually quality though, it has pretty accurate color reproduction after messing around with the settings for a while trying to fix the black level. If only it didn't look like somebody stepped on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Jeff Trevillion
Reviews.Content: I bought this to primarily use as a 2nd computer monitor and it works like a dream! I have not had any issues and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ed berryhill
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a larger TV without all the added bells and whistles and the Haier fits our needs perfectly.  The picture is great and the sound is unusually good. Amazons commitment to customer service is exceptional and they have always met our expectations.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Susan Klier
Reviews.Content: The tv shipped as promised. It has a great picture.  So far love it.  Easy to install and set up.

Reviews.Title: Its not 120hz its a 60hz
Reviews.Author: iculukn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv a month ago, and so far so good. I like it, the only thing I found was that it was suppose to be a 1080p /120hz, but its not, they r lying to folks about that. I knew it was too good to be true. But other than that its a great buy. Oh and the sound is weak, but its cool with me, I can still enjoy the shows without all that booming sound. I still enjoy watching my big back tv, but wanted to get into the clic with the flat screens.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Dana Holt
Reviews.Content: great deal for the price. hadn't really heard of the Haier brand but has a very good picture. quality is good

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Edward R. Taylor
Reviews.Content: This is just a great TV. I know it's a no-name brand which puts a lot of people off, but it works really well. Setup was a breeze and connecting to my DishTV box was easy - just one HDMI cable. As other have said, sound is not good. But I spent $100 and bought a sound bar, which fixed that little issue. Now my TV works great. Well worth the money and I'd buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Crap sound
Reviews.Author: anthony j terino
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing with the tv is the sound.I like everything else.the tv is very light,good picture.So just make the sound better.thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: Could not beat this price for the amount of real-estate it gets you. Awesome TV, very thin, great picture.Sound sucks, but it was expected with a TV so thin, just no where to put the speakers.Even the more expensive TVs do not have good sound. $70 sound bar solved that issue.Definitely recommend for anyone who wants a big screen on the wall, and isn't concerned about paying for a big name tag.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my need.
Reviews.Author: cgarrett
Reviews.Content: Great size for the price. ($544) Picture is very good, My son loves playing Xbox on it. Sound does leave something to be desired but I expected that from all the reviews I read here. Will probably eventually get a soundbar for it. Nice value just the same.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!  Awesome Picture!
Reviews.Author: Duriah Delp
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV a week ago.  After reading previous reviews, I didn't even try the sound and had already purchased a Yamaha Soundbar to compliment its area of lacking.I have no complaints!  We did have a 52" DLP, before it died, but this TV is seems so much bigger; I can't say enough.BTW, I wouldn't get too hung up on the ability to manually switch to 120hz refresh rate.  I did a little research and found that the TV should adjust automatically.(side note:  I guess a lot of movie geeks prefer to watch their DVDs in 24hz refresh rate, so check and see if you player is capable, I've been trying it and it looks great.)For the price, you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Impressive picture
Reviews.Author: ana
Reviews.Content: This tv has a really impressive picture, and you can be far to the side, or right, i mean right in front of it and it still looks great.  I'd give it 5 stars if it didn't have such lame sounding speakers, but I just hooked up a 4.1 pc speaker system to it and it sounded great.  I would definitely recommend this tv, especially for the great price that i got it for on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not thrilled
Reviews.Author: jessica robyn
Reviews.Content: I expected more based on the specs 1080/120 - but I was disappointed. The picture is blurry the hd channels don't compare to my 50 inch Samsung that this was replacing. I would have had no problem spending more to get a more optimal image. When I saw the price and the 1080/120 compared to other televisions that were 720/60 I assumed this TV must be clearer and better quality. My friends 50" 720 LCD from element is a better picture then this 55 1080 led from haier which should def not be the case.

Reviews.Title: Haier LE55B1381 Review
Reviews.Author: KERIETH CAMPBELL
Reviews.Content: This TV was good for the price, but the picture and sound quality were okay.  I expected a better picture quality from this manufactuor.  Will need a sound bar to enhance the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: 55 " TV
Reviews.Author: Joe Ritz
Reviews.Content: Display is good.  sounds is very poor.  First one that showed up did not work.  Amazon replaced with no problem.  Price was good.  Plan to buy sound system separately.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: If you adjust the setting you can get rid of the "blur" people are talking about. I have used it for my ps3 and games and love the TV. I have hooked it up to my surround sound so never even tested the factory speaker. Delivery from amazon was excellent and delivered several days before if was scheduled for. Great tv at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great picture, bad sound output
Reviews.Author: Yoddy01
Reviews.Content: I overheard someone saying there is always a good deal after Xmas. I used to have a 50-inch VIZIO LCD but have been longing for a TV between 55" and 65". I saw this TV to be the cheapest LED on AMAZON and went for it. After 2 days, the price dropped. I cancelled the order and re-ordered. The TV came in, plugged it but didnt like the picture output to the extent of returning. After battling with it for a week, I realized this is the best TV so far for this price. I am enjoying the TV picture. All I need is a sound bar or a home theater to enjoy the sound. THE SOUND IS SO POOR. Haier needs to improve on this. Other than that,its the best. Go for it, you wont regret.

Reviews.Title: Buy another
Reviews.Author: rezzdogg
Reviews.Content: 1st TV had a dead pixel in the very center. 2nd TV..returned. HD quality was not good. Amazon was great with the setup/return process. And yes sound is not good but that's why you buy external sorround sound.

Reviews.Title: info wrong
Reviews.Author: joey
Reviews.Content: Its states its a 120Hz when in fact it is only a 60Hz. And yes the speakers sounds as if its a tv from the 50's.

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: tv
Reviews.Content: These reviews are spot on.  I am very happy with my purchase since I had read the volume is lacking, therefore I knew what to expect.  Since I run my sound through a receiver anyhow, I'm not disappointed.  The picture seems to be great (I set it for retail mode, not sure if there is a downside to that but it is brighter colors)and wow what a big nice picture.  Very happy for the bargain price we got.

Reviews.Title: TV arrived without problems.
Reviews.Author: Clancy
Reviews.Content: , Delivery was impressive and professional.  TV was unboxed, base attached, hooked up and checked by the delivery guys.FYI, they do not hang the TV on wall and are not supposed to touch the old TV.  Read the amazon explanation of the delivery process for larger units.TV itself was as expected, picture is good but the sound is bad.  I was expecting this after reading previous ratings before ordering.  I figured the sound would not be as bad as others had stated but they were correct.  I'm not that picky but the speakers are terrible. Planning on using a AV receiver for sound.  Good price for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with and excellent price!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I just received the TV today and set it up. The picture is great I can't tell any difference compared to my Sony TV. I have noticed a lot of people complain about the sound which makes no sense. It's and LED TV that's super slim you can't expect it to have an immense sound system in it. Overall the sound is just fine and goes plenty loud enough. So far great TV and and excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Bargain Killer
Reviews.Content: This tv is one of the cheapest and biggest tvs on amazon it has not let me down yet. Well worth the 560 I spent this item.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Dallen Jensen
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for my parents, I have been very happy with the picture.  We watched a Bluray on it the first day and it was just amazing.  Very pleased with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Surround sound with external hookups are essential
Reviews.Author: Jerome T. Abar
Reviews.Content: I had read the reviews about the horrible sound this tv produces (and yes, it is as bad or even worse than anyone says)so before I ordered it I went to the Haier site and downloaded the manual.  In vivid black and white, and on page 7 of the physical manual you get with the tv, it says R/L Audio Out, connect the output to a soundbar or other external source.  Only one problem:  the actual tv itself doesn't have those jacks!Fortunately for me I had purchased a smart media player with its own audio outputs so the only thing Ineeded for the tv was an HDMI input for the picture.  If you don't have this or a cable box with audio outputsyou either have to live with the speakers or rig something up using the headphone jack.  Absolutely ludicrous.I give this tv a 5 for a really nice picture and a 1 for no audio out jacks and a poorly edited manual.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy, Model Wide Issue of Insane Lag Time!
Reviews.Author: Jarrett
Reviews.Content: Took a gamble on this TV since I caught it on sale for $600, knowing the risk of sub-par video response time as documented in other reviews.  When it came, I tested both analog and digital signal inputs; experiencing over 100ms lag time for both!  I quantified the aforementioned results by utilizing the lag time settings in Guitar Hero.  160ms for analog, 110ms for digital.  This TV is completely un-watchable regardless of the content as all audio will be out of sync from the video.  Called amazon tech support, did the recommended static charge reset; sadly did not fix the issue at hand.This TV is not worth it unless you can get it for $200 or less, in my opinion, as any content with sound is un-watchable.I do not suspect that video lag time issue is not unique and on a per unit basis, but rather a model wide basis.  In other words, all Haier LE55B1381 TVs will experience this issue.Head my warning,JarrettElectrical Engineer by day, gamer by night.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised. Awesome picture.  Sound quality? Eh.
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: This television was bought for a Veterans club to replace an aging 37 " lcd 720p 60hz model. When delivered on the promised date of December 26, 2012,  it was too cold to be tested by delivery personnel and had to wait for it to warm sufficiently.  It was installed on January 3, 2013. The members are extremely pleased. Remarks as to the picture quality have all been back slappin', thumbs up!! The sound quality, however, has not been as such. Speakers mounted at the bottom of the set send the sound straight down to the floor and it's being mounted near the ceiling, that sound is lost, even at the highest volume setting. Outside of this, the set has, thus far, performed well.Wish I could get another at the same price for my home.We rate this set 80 thumbs up!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!!
Reviews.Author: Laura Nifong
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice flat screen.  The only negative is that there is not a code with Dish Network to combine the remotes.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: RCN
Reviews.Content: Good picture, nice stand, terrible sound. I guess if you spend a little more money you can hook up external speakers.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product for the money!
Reviews.Author: nlabrecque38259
Reviews.Content: Ive purchased a lot of TV's over the past few years, and never have I been so happy with the product relative to the money spent! Picture quality is great, its survived three moves with me, and has left me with no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Very Great
Reviews.Author: Laquan
Reviews.Content: It does what its supposed to and looks very great for its size. Great option for someone who games competitively.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: azguy
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS 1-13 AND AFTER 13 MONTHS IT QUIT WORKING. THE CPU HEATS UP AND TV HAS TO BE TURNED OFF FOR AN HOUR. IF U BUY THIS GET WARRANTY. THE COST TO REPLACE CPU AND FIX  WAS $450.00.

Reviews.Title: Good value for your Money
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: This TV has HD definition like any other, sound may seem a bit different (not bad) but for the price of this TV i an just happy of the value of my Money.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, bad refresh time...
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Although the TV is large with a great picture the refresh time lags and during game play, this can be very annoying. Also for the money the TV has no options, it's a regular TV with big screen. This is the difference between this brand and the popular brand names.

Reviews.Title: not old just right
Reviews.Author: Donald T.
Reviews.Content: the post said its an old verson but for the price for a led hdtv who cares tv looks, sound nice so thank you

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, crappy sound... Catch 22
Reviews.Author: Mksmith713
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit for my rather smallish living area.The picture is nice but the sound leaves a bit to be desired.To remedy this I purchased a Yamaha sound bar.Imagine my dismay when I got everything ready to hook up the sound bar when I discovered there's no way to use it.The sound bar uses an optical cable while the TV offers no jack for optical cable.Fortunately I got the sound bar as such a great price that I opted to use it with a Samsung TV in the master bed room.What a bummer.

Reviews.Title: Damaged in transit
Reviews.Author: Rex A Delgado
Reviews.Content: I just unpacked the TV last night 7/16/13 ,Since I was moving soon I left the TV packed until last night. the upper right corner of the tv casing is damaged. the TV itself seems to be working. The very top right corner is broke and ther is a whole in the back upper right corner. I found part of the plastic in the box i think the rest fell into the tv.Rex Delgadordelgado1956@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: Great picture and color.  Bad sound.
Reviews.Author: Julie Gooding Loy
Reviews.Content: We bought the TV after Christmas and the picture quality is great.  The sound, however is not. In fact, it is surprisingly bad. We have wood floors and really high ceilings in our family room, so we did as some other reviewers suggested, and added a sound bar.  We are happy with the result.  Glad I have teenagers who like messing around with electronics!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nakeisha S Matthews
Reviews.Content: No complain and for the price that hubby and I purchase it for, please why complain?!!!  It works great and we love to kick back in our master bedroom and watch it.  Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good, unless you need warranty work.
Reviews.Author: advocation
Reviews.Content: Well, this tv on its own isn't terrible. 720p picture quality is fairly good, but not the sharpest I've seen, even from other Haier TV's.The bad:-Sound quality is terrible.-Do not try to hook this up to your computer unless you want a hassle to get 1920x1080 resolution. While it states it's a 1080p tv, it's default resolution is that of 720p. Try to set it higher? You can, but you will have a blurry picture quality.The worst:-Warranty. I have a failed HDMI port, and the other is slowly failing, not wanting to recognize any input. Called Haier, and after 30 minutes, the rep told me they would ship me out a new tv. Called back a week later, and the new rep said they would not ship me out a new tv, and that I would be forced to take it into a service center that is 50 miles away, and have to get it repaired. They would not ship me the parts to do myself (needs a new main board), and would not budge at all. So not only was I originally lied to, they want me to drive a good 100 miles round trip multiple times to get the tv worked on.Good luck with Haier, but I will never purchase a product from them again.

Reviews.Title: No audio outputs!
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: It says it has audio outputs, but it does not, infuriating!  This is the first tv I have ever owned with no audio out.

Reviews.Title: haier 55
Reviews.Author: david cote
Reviews.Content: love it the price was right the sound is not good but the pic is great well worth it dave

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable deal for the price! Great picture, but weak on the sound (as I read on other reviews before I bought it).
Reviews.Author: Zed Daniels
Reviews.Content: I read reviews on this product before I bought it. Some mentioned that the sound quality was weak - and I agree. But never fear... Simply hook up to your stereo and you've got a wonderful big screen theater with great sound. Recommended!Side note: The first one I got had - what seemed to be - a power supply problem. It worked at first, but got to the point where I could not turn it on unless I unplugged it, then plugged it in again. Then is stopped working altogether. I contacted Amazon and they instantly reordered another one. The deliver guys picked up the old one and set up the new one! What a great testimony of how Amazon serves their customers. I was amazingly impressed!!!

Reviews.Title: Great, sort of.
Reviews.Author: Bruce Peterson
Reviews.Content: This TV works great on our kitchen.  My only complaint is the sound reminds me of an old transistor radio.

Reviews.Title: TV/Haier = 1 star, Amazon = 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Charles Fraser "ChazCo."
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because the price was excellent for the specs of the TV.  I hadn't heard of Haier before, but the reviews were good except for the sound and I'm using external speakers so I never use the internal speakers anyway.  The TV arrived on time, as usual with Amazon.  This was January 7.  I set up the TV that night and it looked great and worked..... for about four minutes.  As I was cleaning up the packaging the screen went completely blank.  I waited in case the broadcast was messed up, no such luck.  I checked other inputs, no good.  The TV's own menu wouldn't even come up.  The only thing I could do is turn it off and on.So I called Haier and they said that a repair place would be calling me in two days, but if they don't that I should call the repair place.  After three days I hadn't been called by the repair place.  I had lost their name and number so I called Haier to get it.  I called the repair place and got voicemail and left a message.  This was on a Saturday.  On Monday the repair place called me and told me that they can't repair my TV because their field guy was out with an injury.  He also tells me that he called Haier and told them that he couldn't do it.  I call Haier and they confirm that that repair place couldn't do it and that another place had rejected a request to do it.  Haier tells me it will be another three to five days before they get back to me with a repair date.  None of these places ever called me.  The only time throughout this whole ordeal that I got any information was when I called them.  It has now been a week since I initially called Haier.  After three days I called them back and was told that my case had been given to another group that decides whether or not the TV will just be replaced and that they will also need three to five days.  After this I just called Amazon and they were the complete opposite of Haier.  On the first call they offered to either replace the TV or let me return it for a full refund with no shipping cost to send it back.  I took the refund and was told that it may be four or five days until the shipping company calls me to schedule a pickup.  The next day the shipping company called and the next day after that the TV was picked up.Today, on January 23, two weeks and a day after my initial call, Haier called me for the first time.  He told me that he was still trying to find a repair place to do the work.  I told him I had already returned the TV but was curious how long they would keep looking for a repair place before replacing the TV.  He said they would have given it to the end of this week.  That's just shy of three weeks before they DECIDE to replace it.  How long until they would actually replace it, who knows.  I won't be buying Haier again and I don't think I'll buy a TV online again, despite Amazon being awesome.  If I bought this in a store I could have a new TV or my money back in an hour.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tv!
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Sound quality is a little sub-par, but I have a sound system so it is a non-issue. Picture quality is top notch and the 120hz motion looks great! For the price you can not beat this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Outdoorsman
Reviews.Content: I replaced a $2,000+ plasma TV for this $555 tv.  Much slimmer.  Uses less electricity.  Better picture.  I have recommended this tv to several of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Very Very cheap LOTS of input lag
Reviews.Author: Joe Hockett
Reviews.Content: This is the worst TV I think I have ever bought. They got returned after less than one full day of use. The viewing angle is absolutely horrible. The tv is advertised as lag free, instead this tv has the worst input lag I think I have ever seen. There is also NO gaming mode on this tv so there is no way to even attempt to get a better response out of it. I emailed Haier products all I got was an automated response and no follow up email. Their support appears to be a joke. I would only suggest this TV to someone who is only going to use it for a 3rd display in a kids playroom to watch DVDs on, as using it for any game systems is not viable. I will not be purchasing any more products from Haier. I replaced these TVs with 2 Toshiba 55L6200U and haven't looked back.I would like to give Amazon a thumbs up as they gave me no greif in returning them. I returned these TV's because they do not perform as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Good Small TV For the Price
Reviews.Author: Frasern1
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV so I would have something for my bedroom and I am overall impressed with it for the price.  While the picture quality is nothing to brag about it looks good enough.  The built in speakers are plenty loud that I don't need to worry about getting a sound bar or speakers and it has lots of input options.  Overall I am happy with it as it gets the job done.  I wasn't expecting amazing picture quality or anything of that sort.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for ANY Price
Reviews.Author: Brad A.
Reviews.Content: We needed a cheap 50'+ TV for our retail sofa store in Austin.  This TV looks and sounds great.  And for just over $500?!?  Best deal around.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: J. K. "J K"
Reviews.Content: Works great. I notice my DVD player and a Blu Ray always show 60Hz on the screen and can't tell if that is a setting on the player, disk, or TV. But still looks like very high quality HD with 3 HDMI, USB, audio, and other ports to make it simple. Amazon had some company come to deliver, set it up, and take the trash which I did NOT expect and it made the process very easy.

Reviews.Title: Absolute JUNK
Reviews.Author: ED BROWN
Reviews.Content: The first TV came in a box that was BEAT UP, I hung on my TV stand and powered up to blue screen, the TV had several places in the screen that were damaged.  They arranged to pick up the TV and bring me another one, which arrived on the 23rd of Jan. The second TV came in a more damaged box, so when I opened the box, I found the stand for the TV to be shattered, broken to pieces, made of GLASS, yeah thick glass with a little bit of steel and some plastic.  When I called Amazon they informed me that they had no more TV's for the price that I paid, but could buy one from another merchant, on Amazon for way more money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture Quality, Poor Performance/Speed
Reviews.Author: Chad J Smith
Reviews.Content: response time makes all games unplayable, even managing menus take forever and a day, super glossy too, anywhere else in the house and their would have been awful glare

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixels
Reviews.Author: Curt E. Cook
Reviews.Content: This is the preliminary review.  I contacted Amazon and await a replacement.  Dead pixels and a scuffed up bezel.  Shouldn't the manufacture test the device before it is sent out to retailers?Amazon is NOT charging me for the exchange.  What a great company.Update.  The new TV arrived and guess what?  More dead pixels.  You can't shortcut quality folks - pass on this TV.

Reviews.Title: Returned it yesterday - not up to par
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Ordered black Friday - color was not vivid as my LG, sound quality was terrible -had to hook up speakers to get anything but tinny sound.  Couldn't read the menu from anywhere but 2 inches from the screen.  I will wait and get another LG when a good deal comes along.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Carmen Romero
Reviews.Content: I liked the tv. But I think the sleep control is missing. I don't know, maybe it's there in the remote control but I can't find it.

Reviews.Title: Bad Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Damer
Reviews.Content: I know this is a low end TV, but after reading reviews from several sites and because it fit my budget I decided to give it a try. Most reviews complained about audio quality. I did not have such an issue. I am not an audio expert, but at least volume was good. I did have issues with the picture quality. With the default settings faces were too red. I am a software developer so I consider to be above average when it comes to technical stuff, so I tried to adjust the controls, but I could not reach a happy medium. Colors where always either too warm or too cool. I also noticed true HD chanels suffered pixalation and lag. I own 2 year old 47 inch Sony Bravia and have never had those issues with it. I admit this is the largest TV set I have purchased, if not the most expensive, but still the experience fell short of expectations.

Reviews.Title: Wierd behavior in a TV
Reviews.Author: ticked off
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellant. The sound quality is not bad. I found that I could make it a bit better buy adjusting the bass and treble controlls. But there is one annoying quirk. The picture keeps going to a blue screen when watching channel 31. The sound continues just fine but the picture is gone. I can get it back buy moving the channel up one and then back again. Why this happens every so often and only on channel 31 I have no idea. Also the tuner on this tv won't go to channel 2.1 just buy pressing 2. You must press "2" then "." then "1" and so on with every channel. Very annoying. I checked all the settings and there is nothing that would explain this wierd behavior. Buy some other brand.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Yulga
Reviews.Content: Of the 4 months I've owned the TV it has worked for 3 weeks.  There is no picture.  Customer service has been absolutely useless in getting me a working TV.  They've sent a repair man 3 times and still no picture.  It seems like they want to run out the 12 month warranty by just giving me the run around.Never another product produced by Haier

Reviews.Title: Sound is terrible
Reviews.Author: Kelly Goff
Reviews.Content: The picture is decent, but the sound is totally unintelligible. Not just poor quality- completely unusable, even for simple news.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, awful sound
Reviews.Author: Adam Goldstein
Reviews.Content: This TV has great picture. After 2 weeks of owning it though, the speakers have blown. We do have a speaker system to hook up to it, but the blown fuse makes a loud clicking noise that won't go away. Returning the TV to Haier/Amazon ASAP. Please fix this issue now.

Reviews.Title: Worst online purchase EVER!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Ok, I have never written a review for a product online. That being said I am no newbie to shopping online, in fact, 85% of my shopping is done online.I originally jumped on this TV because the price was incredible for the size and specs. I always bargain shop online and have never had a problem purchasing items at incredible prices. Though, this item is definitely a get what you pay for purchase.Ghosting: The 120hz processing this TV has is absolutely awful.Color: The Color is too vivid and takes a ton of adjustment to make it look correct.Size: The size and slimness of this LED TV is the only thing it has going for it.Conclusion: I asked for a return after the second day of having it... The TV is not pleasant to watch at all with the ghosting issue. What makes it even worse is the fact that not only do you wait 10 business days to get the TV but you have to wait another 10 days for it to get to Amazon and another 3-5 for your money to be returned to you.... It took me 24 days to get my money back to my hands. Just an absolute headache, I will never purchase another Haier TV, or large product from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Not up to my expectations
Reviews.Author: KingBush#1
Reviews.Content: Audio and visual were not up to par. Couldn't hook up optical cable. NBA approved, not. Waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Not good, spend the extra money on a different tv, would return but it's a garage tv, I would not recommend this tv to anyone

Reviews.Title: not worth the money
Reviews.Author: ninjafied
Reviews.Content: picture quality is very dark, options in the picture settings are locked out when using digital signals.spend a little more and get a better tv

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Nh
Reviews.Content: Like others have said, sound is horrible. Black levels were awful after getting it home and set up. I also could not get it to connect through my pioneer receiver by hdmi. Ended up returning and buying an lg led that I love! Save your money and invest in a reputable brand.

Reviews.Title: This TV is pure garbage/RUN FAR AWAY/ TRASH!
Reviews.Author: Beverly Siradakis
Reviews.Content: TV looks good off, when you turn it on the picture is pixelated! Not blurry, PIXELATED! Motion is not 120HZ, resolution NOT 1080P, it is pure unadulterated GARBAGE.  If this TV goes on sale for $100, RUN AWAY!  If its free, RUN AWAY.  Its not worth the hassle of plugging it in.I did return it, but AMAZON failed to tell me they charge me for the shipping back, and a restocking fee!  Worst transaction ever on AMAZON, thinking about banning them, and I for sure banned HAIER!
